attributes.action: publicise the exact amount of tobacco revenue that went into the NHS as stated in the budget of 2002
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the budget speech of 2002 the chancellor stated that the increase of duty on cigarettes would go to the NHS
we request that the total raised by this gesture is made public
before smokers are denied treatment by the NHS having paid into it via cigarette duty
